import React from 'react' import styles from './CourseItem.module.scss' import itemCourseImage from '../../../assets/images/itemCourseImage.svg' import LogoFlutter from '../../../assets/images/LogoFlutter.svg' import AvatarMeng from '../../../assets/images/AvatarMeng.svg' const CourseItem = (props) => { const { customStyles, title, description } = props return (

{title}

{description}

) } export default CourseItem
